text:
Wrestler Nikki Bella is over the moon as she travels with friends to Mexico to celebrate recent engagement to WWE superstar John Cena

World Wrestling Entertainment's Total Diva Nikki Bella is all excited about her upcoming marriage to wrestling super star John Cena.

Cena, 40, proposed to Bella, 34, at Wrestlemania 33 in April after dating for five years, and the couple recently got engaged. Bella, her sister Brie and a bunch of other Total Divas are in Mexico to celebrate the engagement. "We're going to a five star restaurant because Nicole [Bella] only likes nice things," Brie said.



Nikki Bella

"I have no shame in that. I enjoy the finer things in life," said Bella as the group enjoyed dinner by a beach with Brie raising the toast.

"I've been on this journey with her and to see your sister finally get to plan a wedding is like the most exciting thing in the world," said Brie.

The moment when John Cena proposed to Nikki Bella at Wrestlemania 33 this April

"I can't wait to marry the man of my dreams. The moment I'm in right now, you can't take it away from me. It's just so special and spectacular," said Bella.

title: WWE diva Nikki Bella can't wait to marry the 'man of her dreams', John Cena
